Primary Button

Source: src/elements/buttons/buttons

The button pattern can be used to style <button></button> and <a></a> as a trigger to perform an action or navigate to another page.

Demonstration

Markup

<div class="text-center mx-4"><button
    class="btn btn--primary"><span>Submit</span></button></div>

Secondary Button

Demonstration

Markup

<div class="bg-black p-4 text-center mx-4"><button
    class="btn btn--secondary"><span>Submit</span></button></div>

Tertiary Button

Demonstration

Markup

<div class="text-center mx-4"><button
    class="btn btn--tertiary bg-green-light"><span>Submit</span></button></div>

Pill Button

Source: src/elements/buttons/button--pill

The pill button is primarily used for taxonomies.

Demonstration

Markup

<div class="text-center mx-4"><button
    class="btn btn--pill"><span>Tag</span></button></div>

Round Button

Demonstration

Back to top

Markup

<div class="text-center mx-4 flex items-center justify-center"><a
    class="btn btn--round" href="#main"><span>Back to top</span></a></div>

Icon Button

Demonstration

Markup

<div class="text-center"><button class="button--icon"><svg aria-hidden="true"
      class="icon-sm text-black">
      <use xlink:href="#pttrn-icon-search"></use>
    </svg></button></div>
